summary: A test suite that validates the core functionality and performance optimizations of a zero-shot text‑to‑video generation pipeline based on the SDXL model, using lightweight dummy components and inputs for rapid execution.
business_intent: Guarantee that the text‑to‑video pipeline operates correctly across various configurations (e.g., attention slicing, mixed precision, CPU offload, batch handling) and can be reliably saved, loaded, and deployed in production environments.
